member.name: D2D1_FEATURE_LEVEL
member.summary: Describes the minimum DirectX support required for hardware rendering by a render target.

member.name: D2D1_FEATURE_LEVEL.D2D1_FEATURE_LEVEL_DEFAULT
member.summary: Direct2D determines whether the video card provides adequate hardware rendering support.

member.name: D2D1_FEATURE_LEVEL.D2D1_FEATURE_LEVEL_9
member.summary: The video card must support DirectX 9.

member.name: D2D1_FEATURE_LEVEL.D2D1_FEATURE_LEVEL_10
member.summary: The video card must support DirectX 10.
